Body:
adj = np.array([[10, 10, 0, -1, -1], [9, 10, 0, 0, 0], [0, 0, 10, 8, 9], [0,
    -1, 9, 10, 10], [0, 0, 0, 10, 10]])
contigs = ['V{}|0'.format(i) for i in range(len(adj))]
graph = igraph.Graph()
graph.add_vertices(contigs)
edges = [(i, j, adj[i, j]) for i in range(len(contigs)) for j in range(len(
    contigs)) if adj[i, j] >= 0]
for i, j, w in edges:
    graph.add_edge(i, j, weight=w)
get_communities(graph, 8, gamma=0.5)
clusters = np.array(graph.vs['cluster'])
assert clusters[0] == clusters[1]
assert all(clusters[2:] == clusters[2])
assert clusters[1] != clusters[2]
